thread.title: Jen Prescott

author: Jen Prescott
title: Jen Prescott
text: Through Trusted House Sitters we have found amazing sitters every time we travel. Our holidays are stress free and our cat gets to stay in her own home and be totally spoiled. We also have peace of mind that our home and plants are being well cared for and we do not have security concerns. Membership of Trusted House Sitters is cheaper than one stay in a cattery and lasts a year, plus you get free months when you recommend it to others.
